content: next st double_crochet blo in next 21 23 25 sts twice decrease 1dc in st with marker decrease 1dc in each st to 2 sts 46 50 54 sts before green marker decrease 1dc in st with marker rnds 14 21 work in patt 42 46 50 sts repeat rnds 2 3 another 5 5 5 times 22 26 30 sts separating for heel fasten_off leaving a tail of approximately 15 cm using tapestry round 22 make 23 25 27 chainless foundation double_crochet miss next needle and the tail sew heel opening closed weave in the end 23 25 27 sts 1dc blo in each st to end 46 50 54 sts finishing foot weave in ends round 23 1dc blo in each st to end when you complete your socks you may wish to wet block rnds 24 26 work in patt them to do this soak your socks in lukewarm water squeeze out excess moisture and pin out to size or place them on sock round 27 decrease decrease blo double_crochet blo in next 21 23 25 sts twice blockers i pin them out on the side and in line with the sides 44 48 52 sts of toes and heel allow to dry naturally rnds 28 32 work in patt round 33 decrease decrease blo double_crochet blo in next 20 22 24 sts twice 42 46 50 sts work in double_crochet blo patt until the foot measures 13 13 15 cm from chainless foundation of separating from heel 3 4 disclaimer please note that quantities are based on average usage and therefore are approximate we cannot accept responsibility for the finished items if any yarn other than the one specified is used queries although every effort has been made to ensure that instructions are correct west yorkshire spinners cannot accept any liabilities for any pattern queries please visit wyspinners com/errata or contact owing to photography and printing restrictions the colour reproduction knitting@wyspinners com is matched as closely as possible to the yarn wys1000377 42 80 follow us join our facebook community wys crafter s hub 5 053682 006650 2 airedale park royd ings avenue keighley west yorkshire bd21 4dg +44 0 1535 664500 sales@wyspinners com wyspinners com
